Message.Title: GM, KO are among Five stocks both Buffett and insiders like
Message.Msg: KO is of Five stocks both Buffett and insiders like Read more on MarketWatch today

Topic.Title: GM, KO are among Five stocks both Buffett and insiders like

Message.Msg: The USDA says the orange crop in Florida will be 10% smaller than an earlier forecast. Farmers in the state blame a bacterial disease for the reduced outlook for this year's harvest. The read-through: PepsiCo and Coca-Cola have seen orange juice commodity prices rise 23% YTD in a market where hedges have gone awry in the past.

Message.Title: maybe Buffett merges KO with his Berkshire hathaway Possible?
Message.Msg: maybe in a cash and stock deal? $48 to $50 a share?

Message.Title: Remember the"new coke" fiasco?
Message.Msg: The name game is a fad that will appeal to a limited few and will be shorted lived..hope ko dosen't sped too much $ on it.
